field.name: activity_create_access
field.label: Activity Create Access
field.description: Select status post create access. Access determines who can post status activity. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

field.name: activity_message_limit
field.label: Activity Message Limit
field.description: Input number of characters a status message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

field.name: activity_paging
field.label: Activity Paging
field.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

field.name: activity_limit
field.label: Activity Page Limit
field.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Leave empty for same as global.
